title: How Bad Are Things in China’s Property Market?
sub_head: Government curbs on borrowing in China’s property sector have triggered uncertainty for many market participants
body: Government curbs on borrowing in China’s property sector have helped set off a spiral of falling home sales, surging corporate bond yields and waning confidence among investors and prospective home buyers. While the past few days have brought a modest improvement in sentiment, the giant China Evergrande Group and several smaller peers have already fallen into default and casualties could continue to mount. Here’s where the market stands as 2022 gets under way.
